HYDRAS:

"Then start to work"said shrply Hdyras whose had a very foul mood and 
answering to Cryotek said"Still I have to pick up... that thing but I need 
some totally loyal troops in good shape... Tell me about those arrangements"

-----Original Message----- 
From: Super Cyclonus
Sent: Monday, May 09, 2011 11:13 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Hydras and Predacons

> <OLD>
>
> "All Fuctional predacons stay alert..."said sharply Hydras while he headed
> towards the the base"Cyclonus and Tarantulus, if you are with slight
> scrachers... WORK in that place, I wanted it undetectable and secure; this
> is a temporal refuge, but we will remain there a while..."said Hydras 
> while
> he typed an encoded message to his 'Tutor' "I'm interested in your offer, 
> my
> tutor, for the blank protophorm and a base... say your price..."

<NEW>

Cyclonus, who is actually walking with Hydras nodded, "Yes sir."
Cyclonus' words were cool and confident. Cyclonus looked as if he had
sustained damage in the battle, but not enough were he was in vital
need of repairs.

Cyclonus paused to begin speaking into his radio, obviously giving
orders to different ones. With a gesture he sent Deepstryke to the
repair chamber and Scourge as well. Both of them looked more damaged
and would need a few hours of repair or more to be ready for duty.

With a curt nod they both began walking towards the base.

However from Taratulus there was a small pause before he responded,
"Yes." he said craftilly. "This 'base', if you want to call it that,
will need a lot of work." There was a bit of grumbling on Taratulus'
part, although it was too low for the radio to pick it up clearly.

Hydras also got an answering call from Cryotek, Hydras' old tutor,
"Yessss." he said thoughtfully as his voice came over the radio.
"Ahhhh yes, the Base!." Scytoek's voice was at once joyous and
voctorius as  he answered Hydras' call. "I do believe you chose to
disdain my offer." Cryotek said, there was a note of chiding in his
voice. "I had thought to send you to investigate it and bring back
what you found. Now I had to make . . . shall we say . . . other
arrangements."

There was a pause from Cryotek and then a sly, "Hmmmmm, perhaps there
is something you can do for me. There are a few Predacons milling
around at the old Relay City. They could be of use to me. Bring them
to me and I shall consider your desire for the base."

(TAG)

Preston
